items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muah
items.body: 3 words: UH-MAZE-ING! Cannot believe I didn't spend hundreds! Dress is BEAUTIFULLY MADE AND SO FLATTERING! fits TTS (always trust Amazon sizing recs) and despite my 5'4 stature, I look more like a tall statuette in this gorgeous dress! It's everything you want it to be!! Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Very nice color, style and fit; great price for quality and comfort; however true to size, ordered a Medium and had to return and order a Small; stay true to your size. Read more
items.author: Maria S Cevallos

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, flattering dress.
items.body: This dress is very flattering. Everything just hits in the right spots and disguises the right spots! The sheer paneling is so pretty against skin and just so flattering. Love how this dress fits and how it feels while wearing it. The dress is very stretchy, so if youâ€™re in between sizes, size down. The overall fit is true to size. The length is prefect for me, so if youâ€™re tall, itâ€™ll be on the shorter side for you. The quality of ok, so donâ€™t plan on getting a bunch of wears out of this dress. Maybe 2-3 events. For the price, itâ€™s totally worth it! I received som many compliments on this and even met a friend borrow and she received so May compliments. Oh, one other thing, the boob coverage portion is on the thinner side, so be careful with your bra choice. Beautiful dress. Gave three stars for the quality. Read more
items.author: Honestly J

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Maxi Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Royal Blue, Black, Coffee, Sapphire Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
